columns.name: name
columns.description: The display name of the tenant.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The fully qualified ID of the tenant. For example, /tenants/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000.

columns.name: tenant_category
columns.description: The tenant category. Possible values include: 'Home', 'ProjectedBy', 'ManagedBy'.

columns.name: country
columns.description: Country/region name of the address for the tenant.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The list of domains for the tenant.

columns.name: domains
columns.description: The list of domains for the tenant.
